mapper.insert: insert into questionnaire_submit_information (id, user_id, questionnaire_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionnaireId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select a.*, b.questionnaire_description, c.user_name, d.convert_name, c.telphone_num as telphoneNum from questionnaire_submit_information a left join (select * from questionnaire_information where del_flag = 0) b on a.questionnaire_id = b.id left join user_information c on a.user_id = c.id left join (select * from sys_dict where column_name = 'questionnaire_type') d on b.questionnaire_type = d.column_value

select t.id as questionnaireId, dict.convert_name as questionnaireName, IFNULL(sub.count, 0) as submitCount from questionnaire_information t LEFT JOIN (select * from sys_dict where column_name = 'questionnaire_type') dict on t.questionnaire_type = dict.column_value left join (select count(*) as count, questionnaire_id from questionnaire_submit_information where user_id = #{userId} group by questionnaire_id) sub on t.id = sub.questionnaire_id
